items.sentence: It's no secret that Tom's opinion is different from yours.
It's a pity we didn't do that when we had the opportunity.
I thought that the best thing would be to tell Tom myself.
It was in the 1920s that a big earthquake destroyed Tokyo.
I lived in Tokyo a few years ago, but now I live in Kyoto.
Tom managed to stop Mary from doing something very stupid.
I may need someone to help me salvage my political career.
With those results, you won't be able to go to university.
Compiling a dictionary demands an enormous amount of time.
I'll give you the ice cream after you eat all the carrots.
